modName: Liliths Doombringer - Custom Warhammer and Mace
summary: This mod adds a  detailed warhammer and a mace / 1-handed hammer to the daedric crafting section. These weapons are meant for end-game and are 1 point above the dragonbone weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Got problems, advice or ideas? Make a comment! All feedback is very welcome.

Description:
- - - - - - - -
Latest version: 1.0

This mod adds a  detailed warhammer and a mace / 1-handed hammer to the daedric crafting section. These weapons are meant for end-game and are 1 point above the dragonbone weapons (warhammer: 30 , mace:19).

The weapons are enchantable and tempereable. 

Crafting ingredients:

1h: 5 deadra hearts, 3 ebony ingots, 5 leatherstrips

2h: 5 deadra hearts, 7 ebony ingots, 5 leatherstrips

OR

Use the console:

1. Type \"help doombringer\". This gives you the ID list.

2.Use \"Player.additem *id* *amount*\" command (without the *)


Thanks:
-------


KnightmareLord for help with naming :)
author: wiikki
